name: Avoid'em
description:
Update #1 - https://welnianyy.itch.io/avoidem/devlog/430164/avoidem-update-1

What Is Avoid'em?

Avoid'em is a game (FREE) made for fun, and to test how quickly I can create a fully working small game. Your goal is to shoot down as many obstacles flying towards you as possible! Be careful! For each contact with an obstacle you lose 1 life, and you only have 3! The game starts quietly, but as time goes on, the gameplay gets more difficult! The vision gets smaller, Cubes show up more often and they fly faster! Hardcore mode? It's a completely different gameplay that you need to check out for yourself! Be the best among your friends and laugh in their faces that they can't aim at big flying blocks.

Online Scoreboard!
This game has a scoreboard! Show them who is the best of all!


Controls
PC - Left Mouse Button/Right Mouse Button/x/z - Shoot
Android - Shoots toward the clicked spot
